gadgets.name: Apple iPod Touch 4th Generation 32GB with Bonus Accessory Kit
gadgets.shortDescription: The world's most popular portable gaming device is now even more fun. Listen to your favorite albums. essages over Wi-Fi with iMessage. Record HD video. Make FaceTime calls. iPod touch even works with iCloud, which stores your content and pushes it to all your devices.
